Those who die of sickness, old age, or acci- dent come to Niflheim for judgment by Hel in her hall Eljudnir. They must pass through Gnipahellir, the cave at the entrance to the underworld, guarded by the monstrous hound Garm. Garm has four eyes and a chest drenched with blood. They knew that Ragnarok would come and they would fight their final battle against the giants during which Surtur would burn down the world.
